message.body: Why are you getting a meal plan?

I figured it'd be easier to just get lunch and maybe dinner there if I have to. It'll save on time and be more convenient to use my Wildcard. But as it turns out, they don't even offer a meal plan for commuters during the summer! I called dining services and a person told me a price that was pretty outrageous, but the contact person for the program said they don't have one. Boo :(
I would just put money on your wildcard and do that. I believe they overcharge for the meal plans.

Yea, I was thinking about that after she told me they don't have one for people like me hahah. Might be the only way to go. I was shocked when the woman from dining services told me a price. Like okay, I don't think I'll be eating here THAT much for it to be worth it!
True, but I actually like the food at Bartley Exchange and Connelly. So I was kind of looking forward to that. I guess I might alternate days and figure something out. How you doooin'v
Hahahah perfect! Looking forward to the weekend?
Yes! This week had been stressful!
Ohhh. Kind of makes you relieved that you don't have kids yet huh?
Of course they will! Blue-eyed, raven-haired ones who will probably speak some Russian!
The world will never be the same!
